item.description:
Set on the northern shore of Lake Waramaug, Hopkins Vineyard, a family-owned Connecticut Century Farm, proudly maintains a tradition of making fine wines of award-winning quality.

Annual Barrel Tasting 2010

May 16th • 1pm • Rain or Shine.

•Wine Tasting
•Barrel Samples
•Artisan Cheese, Paté and Fresh Fruit Sampling
•Live Music with dancing, if you wish
•Complimentary Hopkins Vineyard Wine Glass
•Daily Admission: $27.00 per person at the door.
•Click here to purchase discounted tickets online - $22 per person, save $5!
http://www.hopkinsvin...

Come join us for an afternoon of fun and friends.
item.name: Hopkins Vineyard annual Barrel Tasting 2010
